docs.title: mamba or micromamba
docs.text:
Basically, you need to create a Conda environment. Based on the documentation here: https://mamba.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mamba-installation.html, we suggest you to install a very fresh and basic environment by installing mamba from Mmabaforge distribution: https://github.com/conda-forge/miniforge/releases/latest/download/Miniforge3-Linux-x86_64.sh.

After install mamba successfully, you can install many software into basic environment or create new environment to install software. Of course, you also can activate other exists environment using mamba activate.

Below are some environment which contains some commonly used bioinformatics software.
